resources.string: Innovation distinguished between a leader and a follower
I want to put a ding in the universe!
People don\'t know what they want until you show it to them.
The only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work.
An apple a day keeps the doctor away!
It\'s not how many times you get knocked down that count, it\'s how many times you get back up.
I try to live a little of my life like I might not be here tomorrow. I don\'t wanna die tomorrow, knowing I could have had cake today.
Why do people measure life by the years instead of how good the years were?
When Henry Ford made cheap, reliable cars, people said, ‘Nah, what\’s wrong with a horse?’ That was a huge bet he made, and it worked.
Persistence is very important. You should not give up unless you are forced to give up.
